step.context: \text{What is the order of the matrix A ?}\\
step.reason: \text{Matrix having m rows and n columns has}\\ \text{order m} \times \text{ n}

step.context: \text{What is the number of elements in the}\\ \text{matrix A ?}
step.reason: \text{A matrix of }m\text{ rows and }n\text{ columns}\\ \text{has }m\times n \text{ elements.}
\text{In general } a_{ij} \text{ is an element lying in the}\\ i^{th} \text{ row and }j^{th} \text{ column.}
